pages.title: Travel Pack
pages.text: Accessible early-game, the Travel Pack has a limited capacity of 6 items but it can hold your bedroll, and you can have as many packs as you want.

pages.title: Crate
pages.text: Also very affordable, crates allow the transportation of 9 items, even though they have to be placed down.

pages.title: Backpack
pages.text: Whether it is through trade, or Outpost raiding, finding a Ravager Hide will enable you to make a Backpack. Finally some reasonable inventory space!

pages.title: Ender Pouch
pages.text: After you've been to the Nether, you will have access to the Ender Pouch. Link it to one of your Ender Chests by shift-R-clicking!

pages.title: Shulker Box
pages.text: Shulker boxes can now be worn like backpacks, or R-cliked in the air. You can also put your items directly in them with R-click.

pages.title: Dank Storage
pages.text: Crafted from a Shulker box, the Dank is probably the best you can have. They even allow to use items and place blocks stored inside, making them the ultimate multi-tool/block-palette.
